tag_list: venture-capital--central-europe, investment-fund, technology, investor, angel, mentor
overview: Dan is Managing Partner of 3TS and originates, executes and manages direct venture capital technology investments across CEE and Turkey. He has continuously lived and worked in Central Europe for over 21 years working in the CEE Venture Capital and Private Equity industry the entire time. He resides in the Czech Republic though splits his time with the investee companies in the Silicon Valley. He is known to be able to make a pun out of any situation.
